descriptionHtml:
quick edit to the deadric armor this just covers the legs and arms with a skin like colour.
its easy enough to change the \"skin\" colour to match your char.

will change male and female though the big burly blokes look a little odd wearing the skirt.
these files only change the body armor , the other gear in the pics can be found 

http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=305
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=493

its nothing special but until the creation kit or something I can open the .nif with this will do.

install just like all the rest drop it into the data folder.
author: NOS4R2
